##### FILE: all_in_one_deploy_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.7.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - configmaps
  - secrets
  - nodes
  - pods
  - services
  - resourcequotas
  - replicationcontrollers
  - limitranges
  - persistentvolumeclaims
  - persistentvolumes
  - namespaces
  - endpoints

  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - extensions
  resources:
  - daemonsets
  - deployments
  - replicasets
  - ingresses
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - apps
  resources:
  - statefulsets
  - daemonsets
  - deployments
  - replicasets
  - cronjobs
  - jobs
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - batch
  resources:
  - jobs
  - cronjobs
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - autoscaling
  resources:
  - horizontalpodautoscalers
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - policy
  resources:
  - poddisruptionbudgets
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - certificates.k8s.io
  resources:
  - certificatesigningrequests
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - networking.k8s.io
  resources:
  - networkpolicies
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alpaca
    env: prod
    ver: "1"
  name: alpaca-prod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpaca

      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/kuar-demo/kuard-amd64:blue
        name: kuard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/alpha:
apiVersion: serving.knative.dev/v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: alpha
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        autoscaling.knative.dev/scale-to-zero-pod-retention-period: 0s
        autoscaling.knative.dev/target: "10"
        autoscaling.knative.dev/target-burst-capacity: "-1"
        autoscaling.knative.dev/window: 12s
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TARGET
          value: alpha
        image: docker.io/bonavadeur/shuka:v1.3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 640M

##### FILE: alpha-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/alpha-example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alpha-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 7
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpha-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alpha-example
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.1
        name: pause
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
      topologySpreadConstraints:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            app: alpha-example
        maxSkew: 1
        topologyKey: alpha
        whenUnsatisfiable: DoNotSchedule

---

##### FILE: alpha-ns-apd-131.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: alpha-ns-apd
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

  - Egress

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: default-resourcequota

    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:

  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/alpha-ns-apd:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: alpha-ns-apd
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

##### FILE: alpine.statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/alpine:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alpine
  name: alpine
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpine
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alpine
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep 1d
        image: public.ecr.aws/docker/library/alpine:latest
        name: alpine
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: gp2

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/alpine-echo-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alpine-echo-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - apk add --no-cache netcat-openbsd && while true; do echo 'Hello World' |
          nc -l 8080; done
        image: alpine:latest
        name: alpine

  name: alumet_cluster_role_binding
  namespace: default
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: alumet_cluster_role
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: alumet-reader
  namespace: alumet

---

          value: 442V3XBIVI6K43UW
        - name: USERS_MS

kind: Deployment

  name: ambassador-backend
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: ambassador-backend

      labels:
        io.kompose.service: ambassador-backend

      containers:
      - args:
        - npm
        - run
        - start:dev
        env:

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
              name: kafka-secrets

          value: ambassador
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: 34.93.151.246

          value: root
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"

          value: root

          value: ambassador_consumer

          valueFrom:

              key: SASL_USERNAME

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace

          value: dynamic_parameters-agent-cloud-token

          value: dynamic_parameters

          value: http://dynamic_parameters-admin.dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters/snapshot-external
        - name: AES_REPORT_DIAGNOSTICS_TO_CLOUD

          value: http://dynamic_parameters-admin.dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters/ambassador/v0/diag/?json=true

        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        name: agent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        securityContext: null
      nodeSelector: null
      securityContext: null
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters-agent
      tolerations: null

##### FILE: ambassador-consul-connector_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ambassador/Deployment/ambassador-consul-connect-integration:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ambassador
    component: consul-connect
  name: ambassador-consul-connect-integration
  namespace: ambassador
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ambassador
      component: consul-connect
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        consul.hashicorp.com/connect-inject: "false"
      labels:
        app: ambassador
        component: consul-connect
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - consul_connect_integration
        env:
        - name: _CONSUL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: _AMBASSADOR_TLS_SECRET_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: docker.io/datawire/aes:$version$
        name: consul-connect-integration
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
      serviceAccountName: ambassador-consul-connect
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: ambassador-consul-connector-old_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ambassador-consul-connect-integration:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ambassador
    component: consul-connect
  name: ambassador-consul-connect-integration
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ambassador
      component: consul-connect
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        consul.hashicorp.com/connect-inject: "false"
      labels:
        app: ambassador
        component: consul-connect
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - consul_connect_integration
        env:
        - name: _CONSUL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: _AMBASSADOR_TLS_SECRET_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: docker.io/datawire/aes:$version$
        name: consul-connect-integration
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
      serviceAccountName: ambassador-consul-connect
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

---

##### FILE: ambassador-injector_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ambassador/Deployment/ambassador-injector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ambassador-injector
  namespace: ambassador
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ambassador
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ambassador-injector
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        consul.hashicorp.com/connect-inject: "false"
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "false"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ambassador
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ambassador-injector
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - aes-injector
        env:
        - name: TRAFFIC_AGENT_IMAGE
          value: docker.io/datawire/aes:$version$
        - name: TRAFFIC_AGENT_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME
          value: traffic-agent
        - name: TRAFFIC_AGENT_AGENT_LISTEN_PORT
          value: "9900"
        - name: AGENT_MANAGER_NAMESPACE
          value: ambassador
        image: docker.io/datawire/aes:$version$
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/tls
          name: tls
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: ambassador-injector-tls

---

##### FILE: ambassador-operator_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ambassador/Deployment/ambassador-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ambassador
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ambassador-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ambassador
    getambassador.io/installer: operator
    helm.sh/chart: ambassador-operator-0.2.0
  name: ambassador-operator
  namespace: ambassador
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: ambassador-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ambassador
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ambassador-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ambassador
        getambassador.io/installer: operator
        helm.sh/chart: ambassador-operator-0.2.0
        name: ambassador-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ambassador-operator
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: ambassador-operator
        image: docker.io/datawire/ambassador-operator:v1.2.6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: ambassador-operator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/helm
          name: static-helm-values
      serviceAccountName: ambassador-operator
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: static-helm-values
        name: static-helm-values

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/ambassador:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    getambassador.io/config: |
      ---
      apiVersion: ambassador/v0
      kind:  Mapping
      name:  shopfront_stable
      prefix: /shopfront/
      service: shopfront:8010
      ---
      apiVersion: ambassador/v0
      kind:  Mapping
      name:  shopfront_canary
      prefix: /shopfront/
      weight: 50
      service: shopfront-canary:8010
  labels:
    service: ambassador
  name: ambassador
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: ambassador
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    service: ambassador
  type: LoadBalancer

##### FILE: ambassador-service4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/ambassador:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    getambassador.io/config: |
      ---
      apiVersion: ambassador/v0
      kind:  Mapping
      name:  shopfront_stable
      prefix: /shopfront/
      service: shopfront:8010
      rate_limits:
        - descriptor: Example descriptor
          headers:
            - "X-MyHeader"
        - descriptor: New descriptor
          headers:
            - "Y-MyHeader:123"
        - descriptor: My default
  labels:
    service: ambassador
  name: ambassador
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: ambassador
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    service: ambassador
  type: LoadBalancer

---

##### FILE: amf-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-amf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    name: amf
    nf: amf
  name: free5gc-amf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      name: amf
      nf: amf
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8s.v1.cni.cncf.io/networks: '[ { "name": "n2network", "interface": "n3",
          "ips": [ "10.10.2.1/24" ] } ]'
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        name: amf
        nf: amf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config/amfcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./amf
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: amf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: namf
        - containerPort: 38412
          name: n2
          protocol: SCTP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: amf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%!{(MISSING)http_code}" http://nrf-nnrf:8000 | grep
          "200"; do sleep 1; done;
        image: appropriate/curl
        name: wait-nrf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: amf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: amf-configmap

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: amf-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-amf2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    name: amf2
    nf: amf
  name: free5gc-amf2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      name: amf2
      nf: amf
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8s.v1.cni.cncf.io/networks: '[ { "name": "n2network", "interface": "n3",
          "ips": [ "10.10.2.2/24" ] } ]'
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        name: amf2
        nf: amf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config/amfcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./amf
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: amf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: namf
        - containerPort: 38412
          name: n2
          protocol: SCTP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: amf2-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%!{(MISSING)http_code}" http://nrf-nnrf:8000 | grep
          "200"; do sleep 1; done;
        image: appropriate/curl
        name: wait-nrf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: coworking
  name: coworking
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: coworking
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: coworking
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: db-env
        image: 844420410082.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/coworking-analytics:25
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health_check
            port: 5153
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: coworking
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness_check
            port: 5153
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/analyticsaggregator-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: analyticsaggregator-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: analyticsaggregator
        uba-displayName: Analytics_Aggregator_Service
        uba-groupName: ubaanalytics
        uba-serviceName: analyticsaggregator
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.launchers.GenericFunctionLauncher
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -f
        - analyticsaggregator
        - -c
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.AnalyticsAggregatorFunction
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 4G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubaanalytics
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: analyticsaggregator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST

            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: eks-db-secrets
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: eks-db-secrets
        image: 470769016866.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/uda-analytics:0.1.5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health_check

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/analytics-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: analytics-api
  name: analytics-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: analytics-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: analytics-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: db-env
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: eks-db-secrets-aws
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: eks-db-secrets-aws
        image: 456619976774.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/uda-analytics:0.1.5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health_check
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: analytics-api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness_check
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/secrets-store
          name: secrets-store-inline
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - csi:
          driver: secrets-store.csi.k8s.io
          readOnly: true
          volumeAttributes:
            secretProviderClass: eks-db-secrets-aws
        name: secrets-store-inline

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/analyticsviewsbuilder-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: analyticsviewsbuilder-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: analyticsviewsbuilder
        uba-displayName: Analytics_View_Builder_Service
        uba-groupName: ubaanalytics
        uba-serviceName: analyticsviewsbuilder
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.launchers.GenericFunctionLauncher
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -f
        - analyticsviewsbuilder
        - -c
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.AnalyticsViewsBuilderFunction
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 32M
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubaanalytics
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: analyticsviewsbuilder
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/analyticswriter-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: analyticswriter-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: analyticswriter
        uba-displayName: Analytics_Writer_Service
        uba-groupName: ubaanalytics
        uba-serviceName: analyticswriter
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.launchers.GenericFunctionLauncher
        - --topic-name
        - AnalyticsTopic
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -f
        - analyticswriter
        - -c
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.AnalyticsFunction
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 6G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubaanalytics
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: analyticswriter
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: analyzer
  name: analyzer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: analyzer
  template:

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: binding-tone

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: analyzer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          name: http
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

##### FILE: andjeutcha-webtop-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/andjeutcha-webtop:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: andjeutcha-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: andjeutcha-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: andjeutcha-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: andjeutcha-webtop-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/webtop-ubuntu-kde:main
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: andjeutcha-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/andjeutcha-webtop failed:

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/andjeutcha-webtop failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: andjeutcha-webtop-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/andjeutcha-webtop-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/add-base-url: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: andjeutcha-webtop-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: andjeutcha-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: andjeutcha-webtop-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - andjeutcha-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: andjeutcha-webtop-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: angular_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/angular-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: angular
  name: angular-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: angular
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: angular
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_URL
              name: configmap
        image: gporras/chat-socket-front:latest
        name: angular
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: angular-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to angular-example/Ingress/angular-example-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: angular-example-ingress
  namespace: angular-example
spec:
  rules:
  - host: my-angular.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: angular-example-service
            port:
              number: 8092
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: annotatedobject_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/annotatedobject-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: epha
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: annotatedobject-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: epha
  name: annotatedobject-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - epha.avyr.io
  resources:
  - annotatedobjects
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - epha.avyr.io
  resources:
  - annotatedobjects/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/grpc-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.org/grpc-services: grpc-svc
  name: grpc-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: grpc.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: grpc-svc
            port:
              number: 50051
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - grpc.example.com
    secretName: grpc-secret

---

##### FILE: announce-app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/announce-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: announce-app
  name: announce-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: announce-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: announce-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: announce-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root_password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-secret
        image: rahul7502/announcement-node-app:latest
        name: announce-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

kind: ClusterRole

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: router-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: announcement-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: router-operator
  name: announcement-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - routing.lf-net.org
  resources:
  - announcements
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - routing.lf-net.org

  - announcements/status

  - get

##### FILE: anomalyaggregationmodel.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/anomalyaggregationmodel-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: anomalyaggregationmodel-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: anomalyaggregationmodel
        uba-displayName: Anomaly_Aggregation_Task
        uba-groupName: ubastreamingmodels
        uba-serviceName: realtimemodels
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.KafkaModelFunctionExecutor
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -G
        - AnomalyAggregationModel
        - -f
        - AnomalyAggregationModel
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 128M
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubastreamingmodels
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: anomalyaggregationmodel
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

---

##### FILE: antiaffinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to maloth/Deployment/anti-affinity:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    purpose: learning
  name: anti-affinity
  namespace: maloth
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: create
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        company: talent
        devops: "18"
        type: create
      name: httpd-test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: batch
                operator: NotIn
                values:
                - "18"
      containers:
      - image: httpd:latest
        name: httpd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: anti-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/echo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: echo
  name: echo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: echo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: echo
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/name
                operator: In
                values:
                - echo
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8080
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/simple-nginx-proxy:v0.1.0
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      - image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/echo:v0.1.0
        name: echo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

kind: Pod

    name: antiaffinity-p
  name: antiaffinity-p
  namespace: default
spec:

    podAntiAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            name: podb
        topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: antiaffinity-c
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 500Mi

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: nginx
            topologyKey: region
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: apache_ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apache/Ingress/apache-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTP
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/group.name: dhruv-alb-grp
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-path: /apache
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-protocol: HTTP
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80}]'
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: dhruv-ALB
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: alb
  name: apache-ingress
  namespace: apache
spec:
  ingressClassName: alb
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: apache-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /apache
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: apache2_configmap_comple1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to microservicios/Deployment/apache2-iscsi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: apache2-iscsi
  namespace: microservicios
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apache2-iscsi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: apache2-iscsi
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd
        name: apache2
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/apache2/htdocs
          name: apache2-pv
        - mountPath: /tmp/apache-index-html
          name: apache-index-html
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: apache2-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-apache2
      - configMap:
          name: apache-index-html
        name: apache-index-html

---

##### FILE: apache3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/apache-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: apache-deployment
  name: apache-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apache-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: apache-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd:2.4
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 3
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        name: apache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 128Mi

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: apache-alpine.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/apache-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: apache-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apache
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: apache
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd
        name: apache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: apache-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
      - args:
        - sleep
        - 1d

##### FILE: apache-daemonset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/apache-daemonset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: apache
  name: apache-daemonset
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apache
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: apache
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd:latest
        name: apache-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/apache2/htdocs
          name: apache-storage
      nodeSelector:
        ssd: "true"
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /tmp/apache
        name: apache-storage

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  replicas: 2

      app: apache
  template:

          name: html-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /vagrant/deployments/apache/www
          type: Directory
        name: html-volume

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: apacheds
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: apacheds
  name: apacheds
  namespace: activedirectory
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apacheds
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: apacheds
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
            -Xms2048m -Xmx2048m
        - name: fortriggerupdates
          value: changeme
        - name: APACHEDS_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: start123
        - name: APACHEDS_TLS_KS_PWD
          value: start123
        - name: DN
          value: DC=domain,DC=com
        - name: OBJECT_CLASS
          value: domain
        - name: LDIF_FILE
          value: /etc/apacheds-data/data.ldif
        image: docker.io/tremolosecurity/apacheds:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 10389
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: apacheds
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10389
          name: ldap
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 10636
          name: ldaps
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 10389
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1G
          requests:
            memory: 1G
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/apacheds
          name: secret-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/apacheds-data
          name: data-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/apacheds
          name: local-data
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: apacheds-ks
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: test-users
        name: data-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: local-data
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: apache-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ap:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
    traefik.enable: "true"
    traefik.http.routers.ap.entrypoints: websecure
    traefik.http.routers.ap.middlewares: ratelimit@file, security-headers@file, error-pages-middleware,
      geoblock@file
    traefik.http.routers.ap.rule: Host(`ap.`)
    traefik.http.routers.ap.tls.certresolver: leresolver
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: ap
  name: ap
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: ap
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
        traefik.enable: "true"
        traefik.http.routers.ap.entrypoints: websecure
        traefik.http.routers.ap.middlewares: ratelimit@file, security-headers@file,
          error-pages-middleware, geoblock@file
        traefik.http.routers.ap.rule: Host(`ap.`)
        traefik.http.routers.ap.tls.certresolver: leresolver
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: ap
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AP_ENGINE_EXECUTABLE_PATH
          value: dist/packages/engine/main.js
        - name: AP_ENVIRONMENT
          value: prod
        - name: AP_EXECUTION_MODE
          value: UNSANDBOXED
        - name: AP_POSTGRES_DATABASE
          value: activepieces
        - name: AP_POSTGRES_HOST
          value: ap-postgres
        - name: AP_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: activepieces
        - name: AP_POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: AP_POSTGRES_USERNAME
          value: activepieces
        - name: AP_REDIS_HOST
          value: ap-redis
        - name: AP_REDIS_PORT
          value: "6379"
        - name: AP_SANDBOX_RUN_TIME_SECONDS
          value: "600"
        - name: AP_TELEMETRY_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: AP_TEMPLATES_SOURCE_URL
          value: '"https://cloud.activepieces.com/api/v1/flow-templates"'
        - name: AP_TRIGGER_DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL
          value: "5"
        - name: AP_WEBHOOK_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
          value: "30"
        image: activepieces/activepieces:0.14.3
        name: ap
        resources: {}
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while ! nc -z ap-postgres 5432; do echo "Waiting for PostgreSQL"; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox
        name: wait-for-postgres
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.2;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 20
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.2 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

##### FILE: api-catalog14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/api-catalog:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 20
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: api-catalog
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz-infra
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: api-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
          value: Server=sqlserver.infra;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
            Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
          value: host=rabbitmq.infra:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: api-catalog17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Deployment/api-catalog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: backend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: api-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: rabbit-connection
        - secretRef:
            name: database-connection
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: api-catalog
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

##### FILE: api-catalog19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/api-catalog:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: api-catalog
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default

    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done

    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done

status: {}

##### FILE: api-catalog22.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/api-catalog:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.2;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 20
    name: api-catalog
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.2 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}
