##### FILE: api-catalog23.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/api-catalog:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 20
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: api-catalog
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz-infra
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

##### FILE: api-catalog24.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/api-catalog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: api-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
          value: Server=sqlserver.infra;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
            Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
          value: host=rabbitmq.infra:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: api-catalog27.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Deployment/api-catalog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: backend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: api-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: rabbit-connection
        - secretRef:
            name: database-connection
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: api-catalog5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/api-catalog:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: dev-store
    environment: test
    run: api-catalog
    tier: backend
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
      value: Docker
    - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
      value: Server=172.17.0.4;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
        Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
    - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
      value: SqlServer
    - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
      value: "false"
    - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
      value: host=172.17.0.3:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
    image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - sleep 20
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: api-catalog
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz-infra
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 1
      periodSeconds: 10
    resources: {}
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.4 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados; sleep
      1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: database-check
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nc -z -v -w5 172.17.0.3 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep 1; done
    image: busybox:1.28
    name: rabbit-check
  restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: CUSTOMCONNSTR_DefaultConnection
          value: Server=sqlserver.infra;Database=DSCatalog;MultipleActiveResultSets=true;User
            Id=sa;Password=Teste@123
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        - name: MessageQueueConnection__MessageBus
          value: host=rabbitmq.infra:5672;publisherConfirms=true;timeout=30;username=devstore;password=devstore
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: api-catalog8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Deployment/api-catalog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-catalog
  namespace: backend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: api-catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: api-catalog
        tier: backend
      name: api-catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Docker
        - name: AppSettings__DatabaseType
          value: SqlServer
        - name: USE_HTTPS_REDIRECTION
          value: "false"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: rabbit-connection
        - secretRef:
            name: database-connection
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-catalog:latest
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: api-catalog
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 sqlserver.infra 1433; do echo aguardando banco de dados;
          sleep 1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: database-check
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w5 rabbitmq.infra 5672; do echo aguardando rabbitmq; sleep
          1; done
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: rabbit-check
      restartPolicy: Always

---

  name: api-catalog
  namespace: default

    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    run: api-catalog
  type: LoadBalancer

##### FILE: api-deploy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/my-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
    tier: production
  name: my-app
  namespace: production
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
      tier: production
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
        tier: production
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_URI
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: REDIS_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_URI
              name: redis-secret
        image: erkanerbayram/blogapi:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: my-app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
      nodeSelector:
        tier: production
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: tier
        operator: Equal
        value: production

---

##### FILE: api-deploy3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/my-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
    tier: production
  name: my-app
  namespace: production
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
      tier: production
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
        tier: production
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_URI
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: REDIS_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_URI
              name: redis-secret
        image: erkanerbayram/blogapi:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: my-app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
      nodeSelector:
        tier: production
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: tier
        operator: Equal
        value: production

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/synergychat-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: lanecwagner/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

##### FILE: api-deployment14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ahm282/milestone2:fastapi
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: main-script
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /vagrant/deployments/api/app
          type: Directory
        name: main-script

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/synergychat-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_PORT
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: API_DB_FILEPATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: lanecwagner/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-volume
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

##### FILE: api-deployment17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: node_env
              name: app-config
        - name: DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_url
              name: app-config
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: jwt_secret
              name: app-config
        image: gustavogcosta/api
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000

---

##### FILE: api-deployment18.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudchamp/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    env: demo
    role: api
  name: api
  namespace: cloudchamp
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongo-0.mongo,mongo-1.mongo,mongo-2.mongo:27017/langdb?replicaSet=rs0
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: cloudacademydevops/api:v3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: data-api
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: data-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: data-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql
        - name: DB_USER
          value: root
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: mydatabase
        image: data-api-server
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: data-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: api-deployment-2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BE_PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-user
              name: api-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-password
              name: api-secret
        image: hgupta007/simple-todo:17
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 512m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 512m
            memory: 512Mi

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/synergychat-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_PORT
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: API_DB_FILEPATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: lanecwagner/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-volume
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudchamp/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    env: demo
    role: api
  name: api
  namespace: cloudchamp
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongo-0.mongo,mongo-1.mongo,mongo-2.mongo:27017/langdb?replicaSet=rs0
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: cloudacademydevops/api:v3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1

---

##### FILE: api-deployment24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: api
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: server
      app.kubernetes.io/name: api
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: server
        app.kubernetes.io/name: api
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_PUBLIC_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: public_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: JWT_PRIVATE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: private_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: mongodb-headless:27017
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          value: root
        image: thierno19/projet5-gke-node-api
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: docker-hub-secret

---

##### FILE: api-deployment-3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BE_PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-user
              name: api-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-password
              name: api-secret
        image: hgupta007/simple-todo:abc
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 512m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 512m
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: api-deployment31_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to api/Deployment/flask-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask-api
  name: flask-api
  namespace: api
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: api-mysql-context
        image: devaksacr001.azurecr.io/flask-rest-api-amd64:1.0
        name: flask-rest-api
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi

---

    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghofranechenenaoui/etl_flask:latest
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/data-output
          name: data-output
        - mountPath: /app/logs
          name: logs
      volumes:
      - name: data-output
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: data-output-pvc
      - name: logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/g37-lanches-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: g37-lanches-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: g37-lanches-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: g37-lanches-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          value: dev
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_SSLMODE
          value: disable
        image: igorramos/g37-lanches-api:v1.0.3
        name: g37-lanches-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 256Mi

---

            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH

          valueFrom:

              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL

##### FILE: api-deployment42_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/stickersng-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: stickersng-api
  name: stickersng-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: stickersng-api
      tier: backend-api
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stickersng-api
        tier: backend-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: stng-secrets
        image: eenwemasor/stickersng:v1.1.1
        name: stickersng-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: stickersng-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/storage
          name: stickersng-api-persistent-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /var/www/html/storage/framework/views/ && mkdir -p /var/www/html/storage/framework/cache/
          && mkdir -p /var/www/html/storage/framework/sessions/ && chown -R www-data:www-data
          /var/www/html/storage/framework/sessions/
        image: busybox
        name: setup-storage
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/storage
          name: stickersng-api-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: stickersng-api-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wp-pv-claim

---

  name: api

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: api

    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongo-0.mongo,mongo-1.mongo,mongo-2.mongo:27017/langdb?replicaSet=rs0
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: cloudacademydevops/api:v3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsUser: 1000

          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/synergychat-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_PORT
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: API_DB_FILEPATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: bootdotdev/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-app
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-volume
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

        role: api

          valueFrom:

              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret

          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1

    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:

      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_PORT
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: API_DB_FILEPATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: bootdotdev/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-volume
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

##### FILE: api-deployment62.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: api
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: server
      app.kubernetes.io/name: api
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: server
        app.kubernetes.io/name: api
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_PUBLIC_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: public_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: JWT_PRIVATE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: private_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          value: root
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: mongodb-headless:27017
        image: laurentt/projet5-gke-node-api:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: docker-hub-secret

---

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/api-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: api
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: server
      app.kubernetes.io/name: api
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: server
        app.kubernetes.io/name: api
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: auth-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_PUBLIC_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: public_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: JWT_PRIVATE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: private_key.pem
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          value: root
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: mongodb-headless:27017
        image: laurentt/chap19-api-node:4cb5ac6
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/user/current
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: docker-hub-secret

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to shivani/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    env: demo
    role: api
  name: api
  namespace: shivani
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongo-0.mongo,mongo-1.mongo,mongo-2.mongo:27017/langdb?replicaSet=rs0
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: cloudacademydevops/api:v3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:

  strategy:

        app: api

              name: mysql-config

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret

          valueFrom:

              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-config

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: backend-book-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
      environment: dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
        environment: dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: postgres-conf
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: port
              name: postgres-conf
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: name
              name: postgres-conf
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres_user
              name: postgres-credentials
        - name: DB_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres_password
              name: postgres-credentials
        image: spring-data-r2dbc-postgres-k8s:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: book-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2

##### FILE: api-deployment81.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-express-deployment
  name: api-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-express-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-express-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: matheusgomesa/api_express:5.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: api-express
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:3000/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 64Mi

---

kind: Deployment

      app: php-api

        app: php-api

              name: api-config

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: api-config

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: api-secret

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: synergychat-api
  name: synergychat-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: synergychat-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: synergychat-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_PORT
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: API_DB_FILEPATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: API_DB_FILEPATH
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        - name: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CRAWLER_BASE_URL
              name: synergychat-api-configmap
        image: bootdotdev/synergychat-api:latest
        name: synergychat-api
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persist
          name: synergychat-api-volume
      volumes:
      - name: synergychat-api-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synergychat-api-pvc

##### FILE: api-gateway2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/api-gateway:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: candidate-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /candidates
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: job-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /jobs
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: frontend-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: api-gateway3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: candidate-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /api/candidates/
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: job-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /api/jobs/
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: frontend-service
            port:
              number: 9090
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: api-gateway-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-gateway:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MENU_API
          value: http://menu-service.default.svc.cluster.local:4000
        - name: DELIVERY_API
          value: http://delivery-service.default.svc.cluster.local:5002/api/forkfiesta
        - name: RESERVATION_API
          value: http://reservation-service.default.svc.cluster.local:5001/api/reservation
        - name: USER_API
          value: http://user-management-service.default.svc.cluster.local:3002
        - name: PORT
          value: "3001"
        image: josegabjimenez/forkfiesta-api-gateway
        name: api-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3001

##### FILE: api-gateway-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to spring-petclinic/Deployment/api-gateway:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-gateway
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: spring-petclinic
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: kubernetes
        image: springcommunity/spring-petclinic-cloud-api-gateway
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - sleep 10
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 1Gi
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

##### FILE: api-gateway-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to spring-petclinic/Deployment/api-gateway:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-gateway
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: spring-petclinic
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: kubernetes
        image: springcommunity/spring-petclinic-cloud-api-gateway
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - sleep 10
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 1Gi
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - sleep 10
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5

        - containerPort: 8080

          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5m
            memory: 1Gi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: microservices
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:

      containers:
      - env:

          value: Production
        - name: ASPNETCORE_HTTP_PORTS
          value: "8080"
        image: api.gateway:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: api-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:

          name: appsettings-production-gateway-volume
          subPath: appsettings.Production.json
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: gateway-config
        name: appsettings-production-gateway-volume

##### FILE: api-gateway-deployment8_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/selmag-api-gateway-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selmag-api-gateway
  name: selmag-api-gateway-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selmag-api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: selmag-api-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVER_PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: cloudconfig, k8s
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_URI
          value: http://config:config-password@selmag-config-server-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8888
        - name: LOKI
          value: http://loki-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:3100
        image: 192.168.49.1:5000/selmag/api-gateway:0.0.1
        name: selmag-api-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      - args:
        - -promscrape.config=/etc/opt/vmagent/promscrape.yaml
        - -remoteWrite.url=http://vm-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8428/api/v1/write
        - -remoteWrite.label=instance=$(NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: victoriametrics/vmagent:v1.93.12
        name: vmagent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/opt/vmagent
          name: vmconfig
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: api-gateway-vmagent-cm
        name: vmconfig

        kompose.version: 1.33.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: api-gw
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: db
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: secret
        - name: PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: TIMEOUT
          value: "10000"
        - name: API_AUTH_ENDPOINT
          value: auth-ms:8000
        - name: API_USER_ENDPOINT
          value: user-ms:8001
        - name: API_ORDER_ENDPOINT
          value: node-service:8002
        image: drew138/architecture-api-gateway-app:v3
        name: api-gw
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http-server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 450m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 300Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: api-identity_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-identity:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: api-identity
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: api-template
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.16.0
    helm.sh/chart: api-template-0.1.0
  name: api-identity
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: api-identity
      app.kubernetes.io/name: api-template
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: api-identity
        app.kubernetes.io/name: api-template
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_Kestrel__Certificates__Default__Password
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: devstore-ssl
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: devstore-ssl
        - name: ASPNETCORE_Kestrel__Certificates__Default__Path
          value: /https/devstore.academy-localhost.pfx
        image: desenvolvedorio/devstore-api-identity:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healtz-infra
            port: 443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: api-template
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healtz-infra
            port: 443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 13
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /https
          name: certificado-devstore
          readOnly: true
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: default
      volumes:
      - name: certificado-devstore
        secret:
          secretName: devstore-ssl

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/api-multipleports:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: api-multipleports
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-multipleports
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: api-multipleports
      name: api-multipleports
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: desenvolvedorio/dominando-kubernetes:pod-lifecycle-running
        name: pod-lifecycle-running
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: api-multiport4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/api-multipleports:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: api-multipleports
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-multipleports
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: api-multipleports
      name: api-multipleports
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_URLS
          value: http://+:8080
        image: desenvolvedorio/dominando-kubernetes:pod-lifecycle-running
        name: pod-lifecycle-running
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: api
      - image: containous/whoami
        name: whoami
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: whoami
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: api-multiport-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/api-multipleports:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: api-multipleports
  name: api-multipleports
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: api-multipleports
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

##### FILE: api-mysql-sts_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to db/StatefulSet/mysql-sts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-sts
  namespace: db
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-headless-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mysql-context
        image: devaksacr001.azurecr.io/mysql-8.2.0-init-scheme-amd64:1.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-vol
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-vol
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 512Mi
      storageClassName: default

---

      labels:
        k8s-app: api-nombreDelProyecto
      name: api-nombreDelProyecto
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: secret-api-nombreDelProyecto
        image: upsti/api-nombreDelProyecto:v0.0.5
        name: api-nombreDelProyecto
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 900Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 600Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/modality-api-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: modality-api-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 15Gi
  local:
    path: <storage-dir>
  nodeAffinity:
    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
          operator: In
          values:
          - workernode01
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: local-storage
  volumeMode: Filesystem

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: api-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: api-config
        - secretRef:
            name: api-secret
        image: anuragte88/kubernet:v3
        name: api-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 400m

---

##### FILE: api-replicaset1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-deployment
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-host
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: api-config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-username
              name: api-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-password
              name: api-secret
        image: vermashagun2101/nagp-api:tag5
        name: api-deployment
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    kubeadm.kubernetes.io/kube-apiserver.advertise-address.endpoint: 192.168.49.2:8443
    kubernetes.io/config.hash: 55b4bbe24dac3803a7379f9ae169d6ba
    kubernetes.io/config.mirror: 55b4bbe24dac3803a7379f9ae169d6ba
    kubernetes.io/config.seen: "2024-02-01T01:26:44.246918419Z"
    kubernetes.io/config.source: file
  labels:
    component: kube-apiserver
    tier: control-plane
    xyz: deneme
  name: kube-apiserver-minikube
  namespace: kube-system
  ownerReferences:
  - apiVersion: v1
    controller: true
    kind: Node
    name: minikube
    uid: 31166191-0d81-4775-be27-4aeab86094f9
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - kube-apiserver
    - --advertise-address=192.168.49.2
    - --allow-privileged=true
    - --authorization-mode=Node,RBAC
    - --client-ca-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/ca.crt
    - --enable-admission-plugins=NamespaceLifecycle,LimitRanger,ServiceAccount,DefaultStorageClass,DefaultTolerationSeconds,NodeRestriction,MutatingAdmissionWebhook,ValidatingAdmissionWebhook,ResourceQuota
    - --enable-bootstrap-token-auth=true
    - --etcd-cafile=/var/lib/minikube/certs/etcd/ca.crt
    - --etcd-certfile=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver-etcd-client.crt
    - --etcd-keyfile=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver-etcd-client.key
    - --etcd-servers=https://127.0.0.1:2379
    - --kubelet-client-certificate=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver-kubelet-client.crt
    - --kubelet-client-key=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver-kubelet-client.key
    - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname
    - --proxy-client-cert-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/front-proxy-client.crt
    - --proxy-client-key-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/front-proxy-client.key
    - --requestheader-allowed-names=front-proxy-client
    - --requestheader-client-ca-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/front-proxy-ca.crt
    - --requestheader-extra-headers-prefix=X-Remote-Extra-
    - --requestheader-group-headers=X-Remote-Group
    - --requestheader-username-headers=X-Remote-User
    - --secure-port=8443
    - --service-account-issuer=https://kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local
    - --service-account-key-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/sa.pub
    - --service-account-signing-key-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/sa.key
    - --service-cluster-ip-range=10.96.0.0/12
    - --tls-cert-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver.crt
    - --tls-private-key-file=/var/lib/minikube/certs/apiserver.key
    image: registry.k8s.io/kube-apiserver:v1.28.3
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 192.168.49.2
        path: /livez
        port: 8443
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: kube-apiserver
    readinessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        host: 192.168.49.2
        path: /readyz
        port: 8443
        scheme: HTTPS
      periodSeconds: 1
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 100m
      requests:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 50m
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 192.168.49.2
        path: /livez
        port: 8443
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      successThreshold: 1
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
    terminationMessagePolicy: File
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs
      name: ca-certs
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /etc/ca-certificates
      name: etc-ca-certificates
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /var/lib/minikube/certs
      name: k8s-certs
      readOnly: true

      name: usr-local-share-ca-certificates
      readOnly: true
    - mountPath: /usr/share/ca-certificates
      name: usr-share-ca-certificates
      readOnly: true
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  enableServiceLinks: true
  hostNetwork: true
  nodeName: minikube
  preemptionPolicy: PreemptLowerPriority
  priority: 2000001000
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  restartPolicy: Always
  schedulerName: default-scheduler
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

    name: ca-certs
  - hostPath:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hwameistor-apiserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hwameistor-apiserver
  name: hwameistor-apiserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hwameistor-apiserver
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hwameistor-apiserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: EnableAuth
          value: "false"
        - name: AuthAccessId
          value: admin
        - name: AuthSecretKey
          value: admin
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: ghcr.io/hwameistor/apiserver:v0.14.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources: {}
      serviceAccountName: hwameistor-admin

    app: api

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      app: api

##### FILE: api-service-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tb-k8-nagp-2024/Deployment/api-service-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-service-deployment
  namespace: tb-k8-nagp-2024
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: api-service-configmap
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: api-service-configmap
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: api-service-configmap
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: api-service-secret
        image: index.docker.io/tbansal18101991docker/index_image_v20:latest
        name: api-service-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

  name: api-service-loadbalancer
  namespace: tb-k8-nagp-2024
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8080
  selector:
    app: api
  type: LoadBalancer

##### FILE: ap-postgres-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ap-postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: ap-postgres
  name: ap-postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: ap-postgres
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: ap-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: activepieces
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: activepieces
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: activepieces
        image: postgres:14.4
        name: ap-postgres
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - pg_isready
            - -U
            - postgres
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: ap-postgres-claim
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: ap-postgres-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ap-postgres-claim
status: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/ap-postgres failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/ap-postgres failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.
